definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (portion) Levitical city on border of Ephraim Jos 10:33, Jos 12:12, Jos 21:21, 1Ki 9:16, 1Ch 6:52, 1Ch 7:28, 1Ch 20:4; [[גׇּ֑זֶר]] Jos 16:3, Jos 16:10, Ju Jdg 1:29, Jdg 1:29 cf. 2Sa 5:25, 1Ki 9:15, 1Ki 9:17; c. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc. [[גׇּ֑זְרָה]] 1Ch 14:16; —cuneiform Gazri, Bez:Tell el-Amarna Tabl. BM. 148; mod. Tell-Jezer, c. 18 m. N. of W. fr. Jerus., S. of the Jaffa road; Gann in PEF:1873, 78 f.; 1875, 74 f. cf. Bd:Pal 17.
